actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution authorizing production of documents by the Senate Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

summary.text: Authorizes the Chairman and Ranking Minority Member of the Senate Committee on Labor and Human Resources to provide documents to the Special Prosecutor which may bear on allegations concerning the Secretary of Labor Raymond J. Donovan. Directs the Committee to maintain an inventory of all such documents.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing production of documents by the Senate Committee on Labor and Human Resources.
